caption.p: Proportion of governments that use approach I, II or III methods for land representation, or have not included this information in their national communications (IPCC 2003, 2006) ( a). The subset of governments reporting their approach for land representation that have delineated managed and unmanaged areas in their territories compared to the governments that consider all land as managed ( b). Data extracted from the latest national communication to the UNFCCC as of 2015 and common reporting format tables submitted in 2018 ( http://www.unfccc.int)
